name: ConcToww
description:
You play as the embodiment of nature (a triangle) and you have to try and stop humans from turning the earth to ruins. Destroy their filthy skyscrapers as they erect to delay the world turning into a smog ridden mess.

Controls:

Move: Left arrow, Right arrow, A key, D key

Shoot: Spacebar, Z key

Made for Ludum Dare 50, my first gamejam and still one of my first games. I made this game in roughly 23 hours
